name: Cheerleader
alt: Becca wearing a purple croptop, purple shorts, and purple footless stockings. Holding a pompom in each hand.
description: She does her best to cheer Rosalia on.

name: Magic Circle
alt: Becca sitting on her bed, admiring the magic circle she drew on the floor.
description: Even when she is supposed to be resting, Becca cannot resist the call of magic.

name: A Good Book
alt: Becca laying on her stomach in bed, a book in her hand.
description: Becca often reads herself to sleep.

name: Hard at Work
alt: Becca in a casual croptop, sheer skirt, and purple stockings, sitting at her desk with a computer in front of her and pocky in her mouth.
description: Almost always hard at work, Becca rarely takes a moment to catch her breath.

name: Casting a Spell
alt: Becca holding her spellbook, pages flying around her as she casts a spell.
description: The spellbook is not necessary, but makes for a good show.
